name: leaf-guard

effect.sun-moon: rest works as usual during strong sunlight.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: rest works as usual during strong sunlight.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: rest works as usual during strong sunlight.

short_effect: Protects against major status ailments during strong sunlight.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Prevents status conditions in sunny weather.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.
